topicName: Bone and soft tissue sarcoma - recognition and referral
topicSummary: Bone sarcoma is seen in both sexes, and is one of the most common cancers in children, teenagers and young people.

topicHtmlObjects.htmlHeader: Bone and soft tissue sarcoma - recognition and referral: Summary

latestChanges.title: Revised
latestChanges.body: This topic is a direct implementation of the National Institute for Health and Care Excellence guideline Suspected cancer: recognition and referral NICE, 2015. This CKS topic replaces the former topic on Bone cancer and sarcoma - suspected.
